title: Economic History of the Advanced World
description: Analysis of the growth of economic institutions from about 600. Includes the spread of economic structures and institutions to colonies. Analyzes the internal development of the industrial economy in Europe and its expansion to other parts of the globe. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for Economics majors.
prerequisites: Junior standing; completion of GE Areas A, D3, and either ECON 221 and ECON 222, or ECON 201
